public_servers.name: 4d2.org
public_servers.description: Inspired by SDF, 4d2.org provides anarchist-run services, with a focus on technical transparency, user privacy and security.

public_servers.name: aria-net.org
public_servers.isp: Oracle (US) and Fastweb (Italy); both IPs point to servers in Italy.
public_servers.description: Specialising in real-time communications, Aria Network operates XMPP and Matrix services. The homeserver uses their own fork of Synapse.

public_servers.name: bark.lgbt
public_servers.description: A furry-oriented homeserver, associated with the Mastodon instance of the same name.
public_servers.reg_note: Please register on the Mastodon instance first, and then use SSO to access the in-house Element.

public_servers.name: digitalprivacy.diy
public_servers.description: A general homeserver with a focus on privacy. Note that the homeserver is intended for peer-to-peer messaging, and thus has a short message retention period as well as limitations on joining large rooms; see privacy policy.
public_servers.reg_note: Element available here. The registration token is displayed on the instance homepage.
